description.p: Return the position of SearchString in StringToSearch.

prototypes.prototype: Position as N (SearchString as C, StringToSearch as C)

description.p: The text to search for. Can be a field or value.
Returns the position where the search string was found. If the string is not found, returns 0.

example.caption: Position() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Position('t',CompanyName) AS Expr1 FROM Customers =11
